Hello,

I've been trying to run the source code for Heritrix 3 and I also g=
ot Apache Maven 3. Heritrix builds just fine but when I actually try to run=
 it always fails with an error saying that is looking for Maven version 1.4=
 or something. Is are Heritrix 3 and Maven 3 incompatible with each other?
=

I'm running it inside NetBeans (I don't have a lot of experience with ecli=
pse) and on a Windows machine.

Any help would be greatly appreciated,
Than=
ks!
